Reviews.Title: good little phone, not much security
Reviews.Author: WarrenH
Reviews.Content: fits in the palm of my hand and I don't have big hands so it's tiny, love the memory card slot and the camera even though it look blurry and low res on the small screen the uploaded pic isnt that bad.i was disappointed in the fact that I was unable to key lock the phone with a code, I would like to block out prying eyes but the phone lock only works when the phone powers on for the 1st time.dual sim is awesome, all phones should be like this. overall i am happy with the phone for the price, but I would like more security features built in.
